problem.markdown:
Let's see if you were paying attention! Don't worry, you can have as many attempts as you like, and also, this won't go on your permanent record.
>>Which of the following should you NOT include in the Organization, Course Number, or Course Run of your Open edX course?<< ( ) Capital letters ( ) Numbers (x) Spaces and Special Characters ( ) Helpful information
[explanation] Your Organization, Course Number, and Course Run are going to be a part of your course URL, so we can NOT include anything that might disrupt that. [explanation]
problem.p: Let's see if you were paying attention! Don't worry, you can have as many attempts as you like, and also, this won't go on your permanent record.
Which of the following should you NOT include in the Organization, Course Number, or Course Run of your Open edX course?

choicegroup.label: Which of the following should you NOT include in the Organization, Course Number, or Course Run of your Open edX course?

div.p: Your Organization, Course Number, and Course Run are going to be a part of your course URL, so we can NOT include anything that might disrupt that.
